body:
Comment 3: 
Here is an example.  The signature is "func rowsiFromStatement(ds driverStmt, args
...interface{}) (driver.Rows, error)".

(gdb) file sql.test
Reading symbols from
/usr/local/google/home/cshapiro/go/src/pkg/database/sql/sql.test...done.
Loading Go Runtime support.
(gdb) disas 'database/sql.rowsiFromStatement'
Dump of assembler code for function database/sql.rowsiFromStatement:
   0x0000000000443d10 <+0>:	mov    rcx,QWORD PTR fs:0xfffffffffffffff0
   0x0000000000443d19 <+9>:	lea    rax,[rsp-0x50]
   0x0000000000443d1e <+14>:	cmp    rax,QWORD PTR [rcx]
   0x0000000000443d21 <+17>:	ja     0x443d2f <database/sql.rowsiFromStatement+31 at /usr/local/google/home/cshapiro/go/src/pkg/database/sql/sql.go:1381>
   0x0000000000443d23 <+19>:	mov    eax,0x58
   0x0000000000443d28 <+24>:	call   0x424710 <runtime.morestack01 at /usr/local/google/home/cshapiro/go/src/pkg/runtime/asm_amd64.s:395>
   0x0000000000443d2d <+29>:	jmp    0x443d10 <database/sql.rowsiFromStatement at /usr/local/google/home/cshapiro/go/src/pkg/database/sql/sql.go:1381>
   0x0000000000443d2f <+31>:	sub    rsp,0xd0
   0x0000000000443d36 <+38>:	xor    rax,rax
   0x0000000000443d39 <+41>:	mov    rcx,0x10
   0x0000000000443d40 <+48>:	lea    rdi,[rsp+0x50]
   0x0000000000443d45 <+53>:	rep stos QWORD PTR es:[rdi],rax
   0x0000000000443d48 <+56>:	mov    QWORD PTR [rsp],0x569020
   0x0000000000443d50 <+64>:	call   0x420560 <runtime.new at /usr/local/google/home/cshapiro/go/src/pkg/runtime/malloc.goc:702>
   0x0000000000443d55 <+69>:	mov    rax,QWORD PTR [rsp+0x8]
   0x0000000000443d5a <+74>:	lea    rbp,[rsp+0xd8]
   0x0000000000443d62 <+82>:	mov    rdi,rax
   0x0000000000443d65 <+85>:	mov    rsi,rbp
   0x0000000000443d68 <+88>:	mov    rcx,0x4
   0x0000000000443d6f <+95>:	rep movs QWORD PTR es:[rdi],QWORD PTR ds:[rsi]
   0x0000000000443d72 <+98>:	mov    QWORD PTR [rsp+0x110],0x0
   0x0000000000443d7e <+110>:	mov    QWORD PTR [rsp+0x118],0x0
   0x0000000000443d8a <+122>:	mov    QWORD PTR [rsp+0x120],0x0
   0x0000000000443d96 <+134>:	mov    QWORD PTR [rsp+0x128],0x0
   0x0000000000443da2 <+146>:	mov    QWORD PTR [rsp+0x50],rax
   0x0000000000443da7 <+151>:	mov    rcx,QWORD PTR [rax]
   0x0000000000443daa <+154>:	mov    rbp,QWORD PTR [rax+0x8]
   0x0000000000443dae <+158>:	mov    QWORD PTR [rsp],rbp

Some stack locations are zeroed by the newly added code at offset 53.  Howewever, when
runtime.call is invoked at offset 64 the outs area has not been not zeroed.
